object.name: sendInvoice
object.description: Use this method to send invoices. On success, the sent Message is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to send invoices. On success, the sent Message is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to send invoices. On success, the sent :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of a forum; for forum supergroups and private chats of bots with forum topic mode enabled only
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of a forum; for forum supergroups and private chats of bots with forum topic mode enabled only
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of a forum; for forum supergroups and private chats of bots with forum topic mode enabled only
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the message will be sent; required if the message is sent to a direct messages chat
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the message will be sent; required if the message is sent to a direct messages chat
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the message will be sent; required if the message is sent to a direct messages chat
annotations.name: direct_messages_topic_id

annotations.description: Product name, 1-32 characters
annotations.html_description: Product name, 1-32 characters
annotations.rst_description: Product name, 1-32 characters
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Product description, 1-255 characters
annotations.html_description: Product description, 1-255 characters
annotations.rst_description: Product description, 1-255 characters
annotations.name: description

annotations.description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use it for your internal processes.
annotations.html_description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use it for your internal processes.
annotations.rst_description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use it for your internal processes.
annotations.name: payload

annotations.description: Payment provider token, obtained via @BotFather. Pass an empty string for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Payment provider token, obtained via @BotFather. Pass an empty string for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Payment provider token, obtained via `@BotFather <https://t.me/botfather>`_. Pass an empty string for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: provider_token

annotations.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see more on currencies. Pass 'XTR' for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see more on currencies. Pass “XTR” for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see `more on currencies <https://core.telegram.org/bots/payments#supported-currencies>`_. Pass 'XTR' for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: currency

annotations.description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.). Must contain exactly one item for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.). Must contain exactly one item for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.). Must contain exactly one item for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: prices

annotations.description: The maximum accepted amount for tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of US$ 1.45 pass max_tip_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0. Not supported for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: The maximum accepted amount for tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of US$ 1.45 pass max_tip_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0. Not supported for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: The maximum accepted amount for tips in the *smallest units* of the currency (integer, **not** float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of :code:`US$ 1.45` pass :code:`max_tip_amount = 145`. See the *exp* parameter in `currencies.json <https://core.telegram.org/bots/payments/currencies.json>`_, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0. Not supported for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: max_tip_amount

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed max_tip_amount.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed max_tip_amount.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tips in the *smallest units* of the currency (integer, **not** float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed *max_tip_amount*.
annotations.name: suggested_tip_amounts

annotations.description: Unique deep-linking parameter. If left empty, forwarded copies of the sent message will have a Pay button, allowing multiple users to pay directly from the forwarded message, using the same invoice. If non-empty, forwarded copies of the sent message will have a URL button with a deep link to the bot (instead of a Pay button), with the value used as the start parameter
annotations.html_description: Unique deep-linking parameter. If left empty, forwarded copies of the sent message will have a Pay button, allowing multiple users to pay directly from the forwarded message, using the same invoice. If non-empty, forwarded copies of the sent message will have a URL button with a deep link to the bot (instead of a Pay button), with the value used as the start parameter
annotations.rst_description: Unique deep-linking parameter. If left empty, **forwarded copies** of the sent message will have a *Pay* button, allowing multiple users to pay directly from the forwarded message, using the same invoice. If non-empty, forwarded copies of the sent message will have a *URL* button with a deep link to the bot (instead of a *Pay* button), with the value used as the start parameter
annotations.name: start_parameter

annotations.description: JSON-serialized data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of required fields should be provided by the payment provider.
annotations.html_description: JSON-serialized data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of required fields should be provided by the payment provider.
annotations.rst_description: JSON-serialized data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of required fields should be provided by the payment provider.
annotations.name: provider_data

annotations.description: URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service. People like it better when they see what they are paying for.
annotations.html_description: URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service. People like it better when they see what they are paying for.
annotations.rst_description: URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service. People like it better when they see what they are paying for.
annotations.name: photo_url

annotations.description: Photo size in bytes
annotations.html_description: Photo size in bytes
annotations.rst_description: Photo size in bytes
annotations.name: photo_size

annotations.description: Photo width
annotations.html_description: Photo width
annotations.rst_description: Photo width
annotations.name: photo_width

annotations.description: Photo height
annotations.html_description: Photo height
annotations.rst_description: Photo height
annotations.name: photo_height

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's full name to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's full name to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's full name to complete the order. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: need_name

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's phone number to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's phone number to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's phone number to complete the order. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: need_phone_number

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's email address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's email address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's email address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: need_email

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: need_shipping_address

annotations.description: Pass True if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: send_phone_number_to_provider

annotations.description: Pass True if the user's email address should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the user's email address should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the user's email address should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: send_email_to_provider

annotations.description: Pass True if the final price depends on the shipping method. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the final price depends on the shipping method. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the final price depends on the shipping method. Ignored for payments in `Telegram Stars <https://t.me/BotNews/90>`_.
annotations.name: is_flexible

annotations.description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.html_description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.rst_description: Sends the message `silently <https://telegram.org/blog/channels-2-0#silent-messages>`_. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.name: disable_notification

annotations.description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.html_description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.rst_description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.name: protect_content

annotations.description: Pass True to allow up to 1000 messages per second, ignoring broadcasting limits for a fee of 0.1 Telegram Stars per message. The relevant Stars will be withdrawn from the bot's balance
annotations.html_description: Pass True to allow up to 1000 messages per second, ignoring broadcasting limits for a fee of 0.1 Telegram Stars per message. The relevant Stars will be withdrawn from the bot's balance
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to allow up to 1000 messages per second, ignoring `broadcasting limits <https://core.telegram.org/bots/faq#how-can-i-message-all-of-my-bot-39s-subscribers-at-once>`_ for a fee of 0.1 Telegram Stars per message. The relevant Stars will be withdrawn from the bot's balance
annotations.name: allow_paid_broadcast

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message; for private chats only
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message; for private chats only
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message; for private chats only
annotations.name: message_effect_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object containing the parameters of the suggested post to send; for direct messages chats only. If the message is sent as a reply to another suggested post, then that suggested post is automatically declined.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object containing the parameters of the suggested post to send; for direct messages chats only. If the message is sent as a reply to another suggested post, then that suggested post is automatically declined.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object containing the parameters of the suggested post to send; for direct messages chats only. If the message is sent as a reply to another suggested post, then that suggested post is automatically declined.
annotations.name: suggested_post_parameters

annotations.description: Description of the message to reply to
annotations.html_description: Description of the message to reply to
annotations.rst_description: Description of the message to reply to
annotations.name: reply_parameters

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard. If empty, one 'Pay total price' button will be shown. If not empty, the first button must be a Pay button.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard. If empty, one 'Pay total price' button will be shown. If not empty, the first button must be a Pay button.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_. If empty, one 'Pay :code:`total price`' button will be shown. If not empty, the first button must be a Pay button.
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found
annotations.name: allow_sending_without_reply

annotations.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
annotations.html_description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
annotations.rst_description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
annotations.name: reply_to_message_id
